name: Delete workflow runs on: push: jobs: cleanup: name: Clean up runs-on: self-hosted timeout-minutes: 3 steps: - name: Delete workflow runs uses: MajorScruffy/delete-old-workflow-runs@v0.3.0 with: repository: LinaWijkander/Recipes older-than-seconds: 604800 #7 days in seconds env: GITHUB_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
